name: Waltzing Matilda
description: This cocktail is sweet and fragrant but fun. We like it with White Zinfandel, but feel free to substitute a drier pink or white wine. If you don't have passion fruit syrup, substitute passion fruit juice plus simple syrup to taste.
recipeIngredient: 4 ounces White Zinfandel or white wine
1 ounce passion fruit syrup such as Trader Tiki's

recipeInstructions.text: Shake wine, gin, passion fruit syrup, Cointreau, and lime with ice in a cocktail shaker. Fill two rocks glasses with ice. Strain cocktail into both glasses, top up with ginger ale, garnish with lemon slice.
